column5: The purpose of the program is to develop student abilities and enable proficiency in an area such as analog/digital hardware design, electromagnetics and optics, communication theory, hardware and networks, or signal processing. Basic interest areas of the program can be listed as the following:·        Digital Systems·        Electronics and Circuits·        Optics and Photonics·        Signal
column7: $19,500 USD per year. Faculty of Engineering and Natural Sciences offers different financial aid and scholarship options for graduate students based on their qualifications.
